item.title: Firsts
item.description: I've moved to Berlin 5 months ago. It was the first time that I moved out of my country. And I had actually never been to Berlin before so it's hard to explain why I was so excited with the idea some months before deciding. I've always said I wanted...

item.title: Seconds
item.description: It's been two months since I've moved out of Berlin. I know it sounds strange since my first post was about beginning, my beginning in Berlin. I did try to love a world where the warmth of the sun was rare. But I guess people are right about love: you...

item.title: The best cheesecake in the world
item.description:
Phil Dunphy once said “the most amazing things that can happen to a human being will happen to you, if you just lower your expectations”. So I guess that choosing “the best X of the world” as a title kind of goes against his theory. Sorry Phil!
But as a cheesecake...

item.title: Here comes the sun
item.description: "Thanks" to global warming, there are no seasons anymore. At least in Portugal, I can't really speak for the world. But even though the weather is unseasonly warm and the strong winter sun is surfing through the skies, it's not really summer. It's more of a summer tease. You know,...
